entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 11:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 8.4°C
Wind: SSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
